title: Roostels India eyes Rs 100 crore revenue from Roadies Rostel franchise
description: Roostels India plans to generate Rs 100 crore revenue from the hospitality business where they plan to offer activities based vacation, Aditya Kushwaha, Chairman and Founder, Roostels India said. The first hotel under the brand has been launched in partnership with Leisure ARC in Ahmedabad.
